events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team will review your submission and get back to you shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience as a software developer and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your profile. They will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
You have successfully passed the initial screening where your technical skills and background were evaluated against the engineering role requirements.
Thank you for promptly responding to our scheduling request. We appreciate your enthusiasm and readiness for the next steps.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for coding and system design questions.
You completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and proficiency in relevant programming languages.
The HR interview is scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC. This will focus on cultural fit and your career aspirations.
You successfully completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your alignment with company values and team culture.
We are excited to extend you a formal offer to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer, inclusive of competitive benefits.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed your eagerness to begin contributing to our engineering projects.
Your acceptance of the offer has been confirmed, and we look forward to welcoming you to our engineering team.
Onboarding has commenced, including orientation sessions and setup of your development environment.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you are confirmed as a new member of our software engineering team.
